about.title: About me
about.about: Hi there! My name is Giovanna and I'm a web developer. Currently, I'm also studying UX design because I believe it's crucial to create digital products that are both attractive and user-friendly. I'm a versatile person who can adapt to any situation quickly. Apart from my career as a developer, I also run a sales business. This experience has taught me to be organized and work efficiently under high-pressure situations and I have developed strong communication and customer service skills. I am also adept at problem-solving and decision-making, and I have a keen eye for detail.
description.dogs: Individual project doing for Henry Bootcamp. Development a SPA that consumes data from an API. Made with JS, HTML, CSS, React, Redux, Nodejs, PostgreeSQL.
description.rgb: Groupal project doing for Henry Bootcamp. E-commerce. Made with JS, HTML, Tailwind, React, Redux, NodeMailer, Passportjs, auth0, Nodejs, PostgreeSQL, etc.
description.gioflix: Netflix's menu clon. Made with JS, HTML, CSS and ReactJS.
description.portfolio: Personal page made to show projects and skills. Made with JS, HTML, Tailwind, DaisyUI and ReactJS.
description.avatar: Rock-Paper-Scissors style game. Made with JS, HTML and CSS
